de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap

Class Bitmap32Quantizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap.Bitmap32Quantizer

  • public class Bitmap32Quantizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Experimental Bitmap32Quantizer. It is used to reduce the color range of an ARGB array for color palette. Which means 256 distinct colors max.

      • sortByFrequency

        public static void sortByFrequency(ARGB[] aARGB,
                                   boolean bAsc)
        Sorts an ARGB array of distinct colors by their frequency of usage. This is an in-place operation.
        Parameters:
        aARGB - An array of ARGB objects.
        bAsc - True, if it shall sort in ascending order.

      • findNearestColorIdx

        public static int findNearestColorIdx(ARGB[] aARGB,
                                      ARGB argb,
                                      int nMaxSize)
        Find the nearest color index in an array of ARGB color objects.
        Parameters:
        aARGB - An array of ARGB objects.
        argb - The ARGB color object to test with.
        nMaxSize - The maximum size to run the search.
        Returns:
        An int containing the index of the nearest color.

      • rollup

        public ARGB[] rollup(int nMaxSize)
        This method relocates all colors with an index above max size to the nearest color index <= max size.
        Parameters:
        nMaxSize - The desired maximum size.
        Returns:
        An array of ARGB objects.
